MY projects

Check out some of my projects

CookBook - Cookbook is an app that lets users explore the recipes from all over the world posted by users of the app. User can search through recipes, add a new recipe, rate them, review them and save them on their profile page.

COOKBOOK

Mars - Mars app lets you explore Mars planet, close comets and objects passing by, weather and you may also scroll through pictures of Mars taken with Mars Rover.

MARS APP

Not Your Average Cup Of Joe - Coffee shop search based app that allows users to search among coffee shops in DC, to search by rating and price.

CUP OF JOE

Colect-O-Comic -App that allows you to search through TV shows that are based on comic books, save the favorite ones on your profile and get the random comic pressing the button.

COLECT-O-COMIC
